code: import http from"./httpService";import config from"../config.json";import auth from"../services/authService";const agency=auth.getCurrentUserAgency();const apiUrl=config.apiUrl;export function addNewBus(obj){const apiEndpoint="".concat(apiUrl,"/Admin/vehicleRegistration");const urlWithQuery="".concat(apiEndpoint,"?agency=").concat(encodeURIComponent(agency));return http.post(urlWithQuery,obj);}export async function getBuses(){const apiEndpoint="".concat(apiUrl,"/Admin/registeredVehicles");const urlWithQuery="".concat(apiEndpoint,"?agency=").concat(encodeURIComponent(agency));return http.get(urlWithQuery);}export async function getUnasignedChildren(){const apiEndpoint="".concat(apiUrl,"/Admin/busNotAssignedChildren");const urlWithQuery="".concat(apiEndpoint,"?agency=").concat(encodeURIComponent(agency));return http.get(urlWithQuery);}export async function rejectRequest(obj){const apiEndpoint="".concat(apiUrl,"/Admin/rejectRequest");const urlWithQuery="".concat(apiEndpoint,"?agency=").concat(encodeURIComponent(agency));return http.put(urlWithQuery,obj);}export async function getMatchingBusses(obj){const apiEndpoint="".concat(apiUrl,"/Admin/gettingMatchingAvailableBus");const urlWithQuery="".concat(apiEndpoint,"?agency=").concat(encodeURIComponent(agency));return http.get(urlWithQuery,{params:obj});}export async function assignBus(obj){const apiEndpoint="".concat(apiUrl,"/Admin/assigningBusForChildren");const urlWithQuery="".concat(apiEndpoint,"?agency=").concat(encodeURIComponent(agency));return http.put(urlWithQuery,obj);}
